content: I am running into an error I haven't encountered when plotting a dataArray with a simple projection. I get the error: ValueError: The truth value of an array with more than one element is ambiguous. Use a.any() or a.all(). Does anyone have any advice? Attached are screenshots showing the DataArray information, the successful plot without projection, and the error when trying to implement the projection. Th Screen-Shot-2022-08-17-at-12.30.32-PM-2.png anks in advance. Screen-Shot-2022-08-17-at-12.30.51-PM-2.png
